ModMetaData.name: Standalone Hot Spring Mood Buff
ModMetaData.author: tyster
ModMetaData.description:
adds the vanilla hot spring mood buff to hot springs from standalone hot spring. when a colonist finishes bathing, they'll get the "hot spring" mood bonus that odyssey adds ! (+2 mood for 2.4 hours)
- this will require the odyssey DLC for the mood buff to work since the thought is defined there... you can use this mod without it but nothing will happen :(
- also compatible with better hot springs ! with it, the buff will use the improved mood: +6 mood for 6 hours
